detail.content: Taiwanese American Student Society - New York University              Taiwanese American Student Society at New York University is an organization that encourages the exploration of the dynamic and unique history, language, politics, and culture that Taiwan offers. Through various cultural and social activities, TASS strives to unify students of every background with an interest in celebrating Taiwanese culture.
